SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE", COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL , 2 , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_TYPE , USER_ID , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') create_date , COUNT , BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
